Html:
Hi all!.

My initial problem was with SourceBans plugin for TF2 server (it's a PHP-script). It doen't list players. I tried checking QueryMaster whether it works. But it doesn't work either! I wrote a test application that calls GetInfo and then calls GetPlayers.

Firts request works fine, I can see server's information. But player request fails with SocketException. Here is printscreen: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gmma9mn7iuwha88/1.png?dl=0

The error says "A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond". This is 10060 error or SocketError.Timeout.

Hi,
Exception states SocketError.Timeout. which means server did not respond within in the time u have set(ReceiveTimeout).
U can fix it increasing Receive timeout, retrying.but since u mentioned that u r facing same problem with PHP-script, I guess it may be server problem.

I would be releasing Querymaster 3.0 by first week of June.It would have many features.(including retry logic).
so stay tuned.......
